name: places/ChIJR3ZDP6tZwokROKj9mPgYyYE
formattedAddress: 123 W 79th St, New York, NY 10024, USA
adrFormatAddress: 123 W 79th St, New York, NY 10024, USA

originalText.text: It wasn’t easy finding the perfect fertility doctor and clinic, but if you’re reading this; you have. Dr Kort and Neway Fertility are the ideal combination of advanced technology and incredibly skilled doctors and assistants. On top of that, every single person who works there is genuinely nice! When my wife and I were looking for LGBTI friendly clinics, others showed up before this one, but they were ultimately more expensive, less technologically savvy and less personable. I could not recommend Dr. Kort and Neway more enthusiastically. In fact, I know that when we’re ready to expand our family, there isn’t anyone else I’d trust more.

originalText.text: I came to Dr. Kort and Neway to freeze my eggs for later use. I didn’t know what to expect, as I had never even researched egg freezing. I was pleasantly surprised with how simple and affordable the process was. The  overall experience was great, and Dr. Kort retrieved more eggs than I expected. His bedside manner is great and put me at ease. He was straightforward about the entire procedure and the reality of how many eggs we could expect with my age. The staff was extremely responsive, and I never felt out of the loop. The entire process was only a month or two, and I always felt clear on what the next steps were. Highly recommend!!

originalText.text: Our experience with Dr. Kort and the staff at Neway Fertility was excellent from start to finish.  Dr. Kort is clearly knowledgeable and his course of treatment and recommendations worked!  After two early miscarriages, we had several blood tests, a semen analysis, a Saline Infused Sonogram (SIS), and a Hysterosalpingogram (HSG). Our blood work, semen analysis, and SIS came back normal. On the HSG, Dr. Kort noticed a slight Uterine Septum and went on to perform a Hysteroscopic Septoplasty to correct the septum. The procedure took 30 minutes and full recovery took about a week. Following surgery, I had another SIS which showed that the septum was corrected.  For time perspective, our first appointment with Dr. Kort was on December 29, 2020 and my surgery took place January 29, 2021. We were lucky enough to conceive the first month we began TTC and are now expecting our rainbow baby in December! Following becoming pregnant, Dr. Kort followed our pregnancy closely for the first 8 weeks and answered all our questions. We can not recommend Dr. Kort and Neway Fertility enough. Dr. Kort and his staff were empathetic, reassuring, supportive, and caring every step of the way.  If you're looking for a fertility specialist, don't look any further - Dr. Kort is the best of the best!
